targets.rawSQL:
SELECT SUM(total_clicks) as total_clicks
FROM "${service}_commerce_button_interaction_${period}_summary"
WHERE calculation_date = (SELECT MAX(calculation_date) FROM "${service}_commerce_button_interaction_${period}_summary")

SELECT SUM(unique_users) as unique_users
FROM "${service}_commerce_button_interaction_${period}_summary"
WHERE calculation_date = (SELECT MAX(calculation_date) FROM "${service}_commerce_button_interaction_${period}_summary")

SELECT AVG(cart_conversion_rate) as avg_conversion_rate
FROM "${service}_commerce_hourly_traffic_${period}_summary"
WHERE calculation_date = (SELECT MAX(calculation_date) FROM "${service}_commerce_hourly_traffic_${period}_summary")

SELECT SUM(total_cart_value) as total_value
FROM "${service}_commerce_product_ranking_${period}_summary"
WHERE calculation_date = (SELECT MAX(calculation_date) FROM "${service}_commerce_product_ranking_${period}_summary")

SELECT SUM(total_purchases) as total_purchases
FROM "${service}_commerce_purchase_analytics_${period}_summary"
WHERE calculation_date = (SELECT MAX(calculation_date) FROM "${service}_commerce_purchase_analytics_${period}_summary")

SELECT SUM(cart_add_count) as total_cart_adds
FROM "${service}_commerce_product_ranking_${period}_summary"
WHERE calculation_date = (SELECT MAX(calculation_date) FROM "${service}_commerce_product_ranking_${period}_summary")

SELECT action, SUM(total_clicks) as clicks
FROM "${service}_commerce_button_interaction_${period}_summary"
WHERE calculation_date = (SELECT MAX(calculation_date) FROM "${service}_commerce_button_interaction_${period}_summary")
GROUP BY action
ORDER BY clicks DESC
LIMIT 10

SELECT action, menuName, page, total_clicks, unique_users, unique_sessions, avg_clicks_per_user
FROM "${service}_commerce_button_interaction_${period}_summary"
WHERE calculation_date = (SELECT MAX(calculation_date) FROM "${service}_commerce_button_interaction_${period}_summary")
ORDER BY total_clicks DESC
LIMIT 20

SELECT action, sum(total_clicks) as total_clicks
FROM "${service}_commerce_button_interaction_${period}_summary"
WHERE calculation_date = (SELECT MAX(calculation_date) FROM "${service}_commerce_button_interaction_${period}_summary")
GROUP BY action
ORDER BY total_clicks DESC
LIMIT 20

SELECT productName, category, sellerNm, source, cart_add_count, unique_users, total_quantity, avg_sale_price, total_cart_value, avg_adds_per_user
FROM "${service}_commerce_product_ranking_${period}_summary"
WHERE calculation_date = (SELECT MAX(calculation_date) FROM "${service}_commerce_product_ranking_${period}_summary")
ORDER BY cart_add_count DESC
LIMIT 50

SELECT category, cart_add_count, unique_users, total_value
FROM "${service}_commerce_category_performance_${period}_summary"
WHERE calculation_date = (SELECT MAX(calculation_date) FROM "${service}_commerce_category_performance_${period}_summary")
ORDER BY cart_add_count DESC
LIMIT 15

SELECT category, cart_add_count, unique_users, unique_products, total_quantity, avg_price, total_value
FROM "${service}_commerce_category_performance_${period}_summary"
WHERE calculation_date = (SELECT MAX(calculation_date) FROM "${service}_commerce_category_performance_${period}_summary")
ORDER BY total_value DESC
LIMIT 10

SELECT source, cart_add_count
FROM "${service}_commerce_cart_source_analytics_${period}_summary"
WHERE calculation_date = (SELECT MAX(calculation_date) FROM "${service}_commerce_cart_source_analytics_${period}_summary")
ORDER BY cart_add_count DESC

SELECT source, cart_add_count, unique_users,  unique_sessions,  unique_products, total_quantity, avg_price, total_cart_value, source_percentage, avg_adds_per_user
FROM "${service}_commerce_cart_source_analytics_${period}_summary"
WHERE calculation_date = (SELECT MAX(calculation_date) FROM "${service}_commerce_cart_source_analytics_${period}_summary")
ORDER BY cart_add_count DESC

SELECT hour, sessions, unique_users, cart_adds, cart_users, cart_conversion_rate
FROM "${service}_commerce_hourly_traffic_${period}_summary"
WHERE calculation_date = (SELECT MAX(calculation_date) FROM "${service}_commerce_hourly_traffic_${period}_summary")

SELECT searchQuery, search_count, click_count, click_through_rate
FROM "${service}_commerce_search_analytics_${period}_summary"
WHERE calculation_date = (SELECT MAX(calculation_date) FROM "${service}_commerce_search_analytics_${period}_summary")
ORDER BY search_count DESC
LIMIT 50

SELECT purchase_date, total_purchases, unique_purchasers, total_revenue, avg_order_value
FROM "${service}_commerce_purchase_analytics_${period}_summary"
WHERE calculation_date = (SELECT MAX(calculation_date) FROM "${service}_commerce_purchase_analytics_${period}_summary")
  AND purchase_date >= DATE_ADD('day', -30, CURRENT_DATE)
ORDER BY purchase_date

SELECT path, page_view_count
FROM "${service}_commerce_navigation_flow_${period}_summary"
WHERE calculation_date = (SELECT MAX(calculation_date) FROM "${service}_commerce_navigation_flow_${period}_summary")
ORDER BY page_view_count DESC
LIMIT 50
